string.text:
{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait for your tormentor to return, watching for any chance to escape...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait for your tormentor to return, watching for any chance to escape...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait at the market, your body on display like a piece of meat as passerby make lewd comments about your appearance. You watch desperately for any chance to escape...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait at the market, your body on display for potential buyers. You've grown somewhat accustomed to their stares and crude comments...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait obediently at the market, accepting your display. You've learned to present yourself properly for potential buyers...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
You wait obediently for someone to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait for your tormentor to return, watching for any chance to escape...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to return...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You wait obediently for your master to make use of you...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
Chained on the deck, you're treated as mere cargo, exposed to the elements as you watch for any chance to escape...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You're kept below deck with the cargo. The crew uses you for their entertainment during the voyage...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
Below deck, you're kept chained with the other cargo. The crew uses you to relieve their boredom during the long voyage. You've learned to accept your role obediently...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
You exist only to serve. The crew keeps you chained below deck, using you for their entertainment whenever the mood strikes them...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There is currently a siege going on so your tormentor has locked you up. You silently hope the siege succeeds so that you can be rescued, or at least escape in the confusion.

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There is currently a siege going on so your master has locked you up. You silently hope the siege succeeds so that you can be rescued, or at least escape in the confusion.

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There is currently a siege going on so your master has locked you up. You silently hope the siege fails. Wait... What is going on?

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There's a siege going on, so your master has you servicing the defenders to keep up morale...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There is currently a siege going on so the markets are closed. At least that means you're not on display anymore...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a broken slave at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
There's a siege going on, and you are servicing the defenders to keep up morale...

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}

{?DAYS}You've been a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a slave {?ISCARAVAN}in the {PARTY_NAME}{?}of {PARTY_NAME}{\?}.{\?}
